values:
[VOICE POST]
*sound of what seems like a gory explosion and then a scream*
[ERROR: VOICE POSE TERMINATED]

[TEXTUAL POST]
i-I... F-Father... he is..
...Father... ...
N-no... That monster... how can it be... Mother is gone... and now... and now...
...
Father... you said you would one day b-but.... how could you... in the end... leave...
...No.
[TEXTUAL POST ENDED]

[VOICE POST RE-ACTIVATED]
... *sounds of sobbing*
[VOICE POST TERMINATED BY USER]

[TERMINATE SCRIPT START: RECORD MESSAGES...
ERROR: UNABLE TO COUNT TOTAL]

[[ ooc: Sorry for a post so soon, but this is in response to this. ]]
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/4941.html

To anyone, particularly Kisa - there is some chance I will not be able to reply to anything for some time.  Please do not be too alarmed.  Though I would appreciate it if anyone could pick up Kairitwo...
And Shigure Sohma - if any harm comes to her I will assume you are in some way responsible.

To this new form of the one formerly Haruhara Haruko... I will speak with you.

[Private] *you could hax*
Mew... I wonder, how you might've reacted to this? It is a strange thing, and something we had never encountered before this world, and before this curse of humanity befell us. I still wonder perhaps if this form served some larger purpose, for the lessons I have learned within it and the realizations I have come to will be with me always. When I look to the sky at night, Mew, I am looking for the cords of our bond.
Someday, Mew, we will be reunited. I sense this and await that day... Death is not the end... I hope.
[/Private]
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/4781.html

...Wait for her? - Mew's last request before the bond severed.

...Yes, I suppose that is for the best, fading out of the things which have happened... but at the same time I wonder if it would be better to ignore it or not?  I confess, in this human state, I have learned - learned much I never expected to learn.  And from the Sohmas I have larned more - Hiro, Shigure, Hatsuharu, Shigure, and even Akito Sohma I have learned much from.  In Kairitwo I have discovered something of human parenting...  She is currently doing that human thing - crying?  She will miss her "Mother."  And I have considered it all, and I am somewhat glad I have come here.  Now with Mew back home, she will watch my clone kindred.

And I... will wait to return to her, or her here - and in the meantime I will make the most of the time I am here.
...I love her.

In other news, I have heard some degenerate statements being made towards clones, or replicas, from Kairitwo.  To any replicas which may feel worthless - I tell you that each being has some purpose in this universe.
To any who accuse replicas of worthlessness - You are wrong.
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/4058.html

[Screened from Mew]
The human emotion - love?  I knew of love, what it meant to be back then... but now?  It is different somehow, changed, tainted.  Something is very wrong within this human psyche I now have.  Logic is being destroyed rapidly and even the emotions I know how to master now are being driven out of whack...

Since becoming human I have mastered these emotions and this form - I believe I understand humans to some extent now... but this is... this human brain does not have a component to assist me in understanding.
...

I need to escape.  Now.  Kairitwo is sleeping and Mew is out.  I need to think, and a distraction.

[[ ooc: I note that despite the screening, Mew could likely feel the thoughts and/or emotions he was feeling while writing this - so could comment via a mental message or something if you like~ ]]
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/3635.html

[Screened From Mew]
I need to escape.  I need to do something with this newfound human form which does not relate to this room, to Kairitwo, or to Mew.  Someone, please tell me there is something in which you may request my aid.  My mental patterns are extremely erratic and I need some manner of thing with which to occupy my time.
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/3382.html

Hello, this is Kairitwo, and I've recently been returned home to my father by a lovely boy named Ryuu.  He was a bit amiss, but he meant well and assisted me in coming to this civilization!  I'm so glad to be here, it feels so much more natural to me than that forest-cave!

Father appears ill, though.... I wonder, he doesn't seem to like being called "father," should I call him Mewtwo then?  But he, with the help of mother - Mew? - remade me, so I do not need to kill anymore.  Father is asleep now, but in his sleep he mutters about mother - is he worried about her for some reason?

Anyways, hello to everyone! ^.^
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/3231.html

[Screened From Mew]
I seem to have forgotten due to my cold *sneezes*

I've left Kairitwo in the forest, in the hovel I used to hold up at.  I'm afraid she remains there, largely content - due the fact she doesn't need to eat so long as the sun is shining, but for once her metal patterns as expressing to me that she'd like to regain a foothold in civilized society, and make amends for her previous state of being.
I'm afraid I find myself too weak to commit to traversing that far into the forest, and the cold is interfering with my psychic powers so I can't teleport there as I normally would. I don't wish to disturb Mew so...

Is there anyone interested in retrieving that child for me and assisting here in coming here to be with Mew and I?
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/2644.html

This human form is very irksome... the blushing, the reflexive actions - they all could be done without.  I mean, I can scarcely look at Mew without a reaction of this manner... it's very strange.

Oh, and I am currently in an apartment with Mew, though I am currently sick with a cold or some other malady.

[Screened to Shigure and Mew]
Hitsuji is still actively harassing Hiro Sohma's mind.  Or a ghost of him - residual memories, or something of the sort.  Shigure Sohma, I highly recommend you look into this.
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/2511.html

[VOICE RECORD Y/N] Y

I... have become human, or something similar to it.  The effects of that miasma must've somehow altered my cellular structure, as too did it Mew's.
The sensations of being human are odd.  In looking at Mew's form my face now heats up for some reason and there's a stirring in the vicinity of my stomach.

Strange...
Still, I feel weak - exceptionally weak.  I can barely do much more than move my basic muscles and talk.

[Screened to Shigure]
Shigure, how are the children faring?

[[ ooc: he's human due to the events described here ]]
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/2293.html

The time's close at hand now.  This Jenova incident is over, for now, but it's time for things to meet the forefront on another end.  And it is time for me to fulfill my promise.  For all those I might've offended, my temper has cooled somewhat with the fading of the Jenova-aura, so my sincerest apologies.

Mew - are you around anywhere?  I need to speak with you.
Wait...

Mew - are you around anywhere?  I need to speak with you.

[[ ooc: The bold-italics are a telepathic message directly to Mew. ]]
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/1946.html

Mew was indeed infected, and this damnable aura is frying all my senses. I can scarcely feel normal people anymore, this darkness is now so expansive. I contacted a man named Zack Fair who has directed me to the source. I am going to kill it, I am going to rip it apart and see to it that it can never cause any damage again.

That's right, you repulsive knaves, I'm going to kill your damnable 'mother.'

Zexion... be careful, in this mood, I may have a limited control over where my abilities are flying

[[ ooc: For the record, Mewtwo's lost his cool, which is why he's been so blunt in other journals. He's extremely pissed about now~ ]]
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/1597.html

I completed the modifications on Kairitwo, so she should be able to function without devouring hearts and I come out to discover... this.
There's a foul aura circling this entire world - I demand the perpetrators show their faces.  I can feel emanations of suffering and I fully intend to play a role in ending this nonsense for it's blaring into my aura-sensing.  I can scarcely feel...

Wait ... Mew ... are you infected with this malady?
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/1325.html

Mew has arrived, and I must admit I am happy that came to pass.  This world is a brighter place already with a being such as her around.  She will no doubt make everything in this place a little more radiant.

I have retrieved the replica - Kairitwo, as I have decided to name her - and she is with me as I make this entry.  She's a good child, and deserves better than the fate dealt to her.  I swore that I would make her better, and I intend to fix the flaw that gives her a need to consume hearts in order to live.
And to that end - Xemnas - I will need you laboratory and any notes you have on the creation of Kairitwo.  You will give them to me or I will take them by force, those are your options.

[Screen to Sohmas Bar Akito, utterly un-hack-able to Akito]
 To the members of the Sohma family - I am learning more about you daily.  I have made many promises that you might think I will not be able to keep, but I assure you that I can and will do all I have sworn, in time.  Do not worry about it until that time, but I implore you to let me know more.  I can help you, if you can trust me.
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/1214.html

I had stated before that I didn't detect a large concentration of darkness or a failure of mankind in this world.  Indeed, man here seems to be far less ignorant and on the level than back in my home world.  However, to the matter of darkness I seem to have been wrong. At least, I was wrong for now.  My investigations are not complete.  A man named Kyousuke seems to have proved this world has people that are not ill in intent.

There is no great cooperate evil, such as the manner of which I'm accustomed, but I seem to have forgotten that each human heart has a great potential for good or ill, depending on the mechanism they use at the time.  Spirits are fallible here too, it would seem.  Same for aliens, robots ... even "God" is fallible in this world.  To that end, I need to investigate closer to the source of the vileness, and work to correct it.

There have been two deaths on this night, both of which are to people I know nothing about.  However, I have sworn myself to investigate and hopefully fix house Sohma, and both deaths seem to radiate in some way back to them.  It has been a long and dark night... I am in need of my meditation.

Mew... I wish you were here...
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/983.html

Interesting... This device responds to my thoughts, putting them into the form of human speech.  This will prove amusing and ultimately useful towards communications, as this seems to connect to people all over this new land.

I am not sensing my clones... and the only life signature I recognize is faint, I can barely feel him, but if it is him then...  Well enough of that.

I must explore this setting, and hopefully discover a place to remain.  Perhaps this can be a fresh start; perhaps this world is not populated by evil and corrupt humans who seek only pain and domination.  Thought I might be being far too hopeful.

Alas, I will need to explore.
http://improvedpefect.livejournal.com/628.html
